title: MELODY
lyrics: Hey melody Every night you play me something sweet And when I'm down you always change the key I need you now my heart has lost the beat And I'm counting on your love hey melody We both could use a reason just to smile So let me be your harmony to night Every note you hit cuts in to me So let me hear your love sing  So let me hear your love sing  Let me hear your love sing  So let me hear your love sing  So let me hear your love sing  Let me hear your love sing
